annotation.spannedText: many of these devastating diseases have been contained, especially in industrialized nations, because of the development and widespread distribution of safe, effective, and affordable vaccines

classMention.mentionClass: many of these devastating diseases have been contained, especially in industrialized nations, because of the development and widespread distribution of safe, effective, and affordable vaccines

annotation.spannedText: The historical record shows that the development of vaccines has consistently involved sizable doses of ingenuity, political skill, and irreproachable scientific methods

classMention.mentionClass: The historical record shows that the development of vaccines has consistently involved sizable doses of ingenuity, political skill, and irreproachable scientific methods

annotation.spannedText: vaccines are powerful medical interventions that induce powerful biological, social, and cultural reactions

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines are powerful medical interventions that induce powerful biological, social, and cultural reactions

annotation.spannedText: vaccines have worked so well that many people now take them for granted

classMention.mentionClass: vaccines have worked so well that many people now take them for granted

annotation.spannedText: There have been shifts as well; unfortunately, one of the most pronounced has been the divestment of public agencies in vaccine research and production

classMention.mentionClass: There have been shifts as well; unfortunately, one of the most pronounced has been the divestment of public agencies in vaccine research and production
